price: Yukarılarında olan Rablerinden korkarlar ve yalnızca kendilerine emredileni yaparlar.
arabic: يَخَافُونَ رَبَّهُم مِّن فَوۡقِهِمۡ وَيَفۡعَلُونَ مَا يُؤۡمَرُونَ۩

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: yakhāfūna rabbahum min fawqihim wayafʿalūna mā yu'marūna
